This class represents a parameters

class data_science_framework.data_spy.options.Parameter.Parameter(parameter: str, default, object_key: str, documentation: str = '')[source]¶

Bases: object

Class that represents a parameter

Parameters

  • parameter – Parameter name

  • default – Default value of the option

  • object_key – Key of the object

  • documentation – Documentation of the function

render_click_option(f)[source]¶

Add click option corresponding to the parameter to the click command interface

Parameters

f – The function under study

Returns

None

data_science_framework.data_spy.options.option_manager.get_parameters(optionable_class_object: object, object_key)[source]¶

Function that transforms the constructor items that can be turned into options into a list of Parameter objects

Parameters

  • optionable_class_object – Object that is optionable (every constructor argument has default value)

  • object_key – Name of the main object

Returns

None

data_science_framework.data_spy.options.option_manager.initialize_experiment_parameters(experiment_objects: dict, option_values: dict) → None[source]¶

Function that returns experiment objects initialized by option parser input

Parameters

  • experiment_objects – Objects describing the experiment

  • option_values – Dictionnary containing the values inputted as options

Returns

None

data_science_framework.data_spy.options.option_manager.parameters_to_options(experiment_objects: dict) → Callable[source]¶

This function manage the options of your experiments

Parameters

experiment_objects – Optionable objects describing your experiment

Returns

A decorator that can be applied on every fonction
